prompts: Create a metallic Pokemon with thorny features and a green vine accent.
Imagine a sturdy Pokemon that resembles a fortress made of steel and plants.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests, with a unique blend of plant and metal characteristics.
Show me a Pokemon that has both defensive and offensive capabilities, inspired by nature.
Generate a creature that combines the toughness of steel and the resilience of plants.
Make a Pokemon that can blend in with its forest environment while being formidable in battle.
Give me a Pokemon that has a spiky exterior and vine-like extensions, representing strength and nature.
